ygData.subject: RE: Nagafen 2; Sylly 0
ygData.msgSnippet: ... not taken that way, I asked for the advice, just also shared my thoughts.  I will attempt to guide the next Vox raid, and will require minimum cold
ygData.messageBody:
> they finally got vox down. obviously we're not slamming you Harm, just
> rethink the resist theory.

not taken that way, I asked for the advice, just also shared my
thoughts. I will attempt to guide the next Vox raid, and will
require minimum cold resistance and pick and choose the most
elite of the server group (30 people, since we are learning).

Since we are sharing ideas, we should start a thread on dragon
ideas that work. We cleared the whole cavern out except Vox,
perfectly. It's just Vox made an unexpected appearance.

Harmonic.
